PV.content:

Sure! Here are the "Property Value" entities in the given paragraph:

Sure, here are the entities that clearly refer to the value of a material property:

The polydispersity index (PDI) is a measure of the distribution of molecular weights in a polymer, but it is not a direct measure of the value of a material property. Therefore, it is not included in the list of relevant entities.
